titles.title: A bill to amend the CARES Act to terminate unemployment insurance benefit payments under such Act and to rescind unobligated balances of amounts appropriated for the purposes of such payments, and for other purposes.

A bill to amend the CARES Act to terminate unemployment insurance benefit payments under such Act and to rescind unobligated balances of amounts appropriated for the purposes of such payments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
